column4: anyone here use Mint?  I wonder if pogo will work with it or not, weird how it doesn't work with ubuntu i mean its just a java applet
Which JRE are you using?

OK, going to ask another awkward question which seems to have no documentation anywhere: how do I remove indicators from the unity-2d panel? It appears that the whitelist method to remove Skype from the panel only worked in 3d...
Sun Java 6
Using Ubuntu 11.10, Firefox 10 and icedtea, I can play Poppit with audio on pogo.com
Which games dont work?
Hog Heaven
I'm a sucker for slot machines :P
Any free games I can try? :P
ali baba slots is free with no sound
Hog Heaven crashed my Firefox outright :P

Going to ask another awkward question which seems to have no documentation anywhere: how do I remove indicators from the unity-2d panel? It appears that the whitelist method to remove Skype from the panel only worked in 3d...
Yeah these are straight up crashing my Firefox :S
yeah openjdk does that, thats why i had to install the real java :P
I fixed it :P it required doing some editing to the java.bin file
last problem on my list :P skype.  The camera works but when skype loads the audio is really staticy anyone know how to fix this bug
Works with 64-bit Oracle java 7 plugin with no messing
yeah I got it working :P I'm gonna wait on java 7 till oracle releases it since it is still in development

Going to ask another awkward question which seems to have no documentation anywhere: how do I remove indicators from the unity-2d panel? It appears that the whitelist method to remove Skype from the panel only worked in 3d...

I've asked so many questions in this channel and got little help with them :/ ended up solving most of mine myself as well

No idea, sorry, my Skype seems fine out of the box except that I can't get rid of that vile green icon on unity-2d
